_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Deeds done by someone to be reborn in th: Doing both kinds of deeds by body, speech, and mind
Hearing about the spontaneously-born dragons being long-lived, beautiful, and very happy
Thinking of being reborn in the company of spontaneously-born dragons
Giving food, drink, and a lamp
